debate.description: Multi-participant debate with a moderator, optionally including humans.

confessional.description: Robot(s) take turns asking pre-scripted questions and responding (requires additional setup)
confessional.reasoning_prompt1: I'm going to tell you something that I am afraid people will find out about me, when I am at a party or festival. Please offer me some insights that can help transform my fears into ways I can face and overcome my fears
confessional.reasoning_prompt1_msg: Overcome your fears in this way:
confessional.collective_prompt1: Write eight one-liners about overcoming my fear. Here's some context:
confessional.responding_prompt1: I'm going to tell you something that I am afraid people will find out about me, when I am at a party or festival. Please offer me some insights that can help transform my fears into ways I can face and overcome my fear. Here's what I'm afraid of context:

storytime (WIP).description: Humans and robot(s) take turns building a story.

couples counseling (WIP).description: A moderated discussion between two humans and a robot.

interrogation (WIP).description: Several robots take turns interrogating a human.

doppelganger (WIP).description: A conversation between a human and a simulated version of that human.
